title: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch in a dream: The meanings and connotations involved in seeing a wristwatch in a dream are varied, and as we know that watches in the past were not the same as they are today, they witnessed many developments until they became what they are today, and the interpretation of a gift is different from buying a watch in a dream as Losing a watch has other connotations, and we will remind you in the lines of the article everything related to it. Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch for a man. If a man sees in a dream that he is wearing a wristwatch, this indicates the successes he has achieved in his life, and the color of the watch plays an important role in the interpretation. And we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about a man’s wristwatch in the following points: If a person sees in a dream that he is buying a wristwatch, this means that he is a pious person. If a man sees a golden wristwatch in his dream, this means that he will get a lot of money in the current period. If A golden watch was seen in a man’s dream, this indicates his success in trade and it also means that he will earn money. In general, this dream can indicate the dreamer’s success in his life. Seeing a dead person in a dream wearing a wristwatch is one of the dreams that indicates A good ending and indicates the high status of the deceased in God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about adopting a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a wristwatch in a dream by Ibn Sirin. According to the words of the great scholar Ibn Sirin, the wristwatch carries many meanings, some of which are beneficial to the dreamer and some of which are harmful to him. Below is a detailed explanation of the interpretation. Seeing a wristwatch in a dream Ibn Sirin: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is buying a wristwatch, this may be a sign that the dreamer’s wants and desires will be fulfilled. And that there are many positive changes that will occur in his life. If the dreamer sees himself buying a silver wristwatch, This indicates his closeness to Almighty God and shows his righteousness. If the dreamer sees a black watch in his dream, this means that there is an absentee or a traveler who returns to the dreamer. This may indicate that the dreamer will soon meet a family member whom he left a long time ago. If the dreamer sees in Dreaming that he lost his watch, this is an indication that the dreamer may fall into some unpleasant things that cause him distress, sadness, and grief. Seeing the loss of a wristwatch in a dream may mean that the dreamer will suffer many losses. If the dreamer sees a broken watch in his dream, this means bad luck If the wristwatch in a dream is beautiful in appearance, this indicates the approaching happiness of the dreamer, and it also indicates that he will get what he wants and desires. If the appearance of the wristwatch is not beautiful in the dream, this indicates the emergence of problems or it may mean that the dreamer will suffer from diseases. Certain. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is offering a watch to a deceased person, this means that the dreamer is disobeying his Lord. This vision warns the dreamer of the need to return to God and repent. If the eighth hour in the dream indicates the month of Shaban. Also, seeing the ninth hour indicates the month of Ramadan. Blessed. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a person who turns into an animal in a dream. Falling and losing a watch in a dream. Losing a watch is considered...

title: Interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Fahd Al-Osaimi. Interpretation of dreaming of black eggplant in a dream and interpretation of dreaming of eating eggplant in a dream.

preview.html: Eggplant in a dream is among the strange dreams that arouse the dreamer’s curiosity and make him rush to search for their interpretation. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing black and white, large and small eggplants for single, married and pregnant women, according to the lips of Ibn Sirin, Fahd Al-Usaimi, and the leading scholars of interpretation. Eggplant in a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of eggplant In a dream? The interpretation of a dream about eggplant indicates abundant livelihood and improvement of personal circumstances. White eggplant indicates that the dreamer will hear beautiful words about him from someone who loves and encourages him. If he sees eggplant ripening at a different time, this indicates a fluctuation in mood, and as for eating eggplant, it can indicate cheating. Hypocrisy, and eggplant in its season indicates that one obtains money without fatigue or trouble. Black eggplant indicates the difficulty of achieving goals and conveys a message to the dreamer that he will achieve what he wants only if he tries with all his energy to achieve it. Eggplant hummus shows that the dreamer is a mysterious person and has a strange personality. It teaches him that he is trying to change and be more clear with people. As for the fried eggplant, it indicates that the dreamer will have a small argument with one of his friends, and it was said that it portends bad luck, because it indicates a chronic illness or going through a difficult experience. Cutting it into slices in the vision indicates that the responsibility that The dreamer endures a large and difficult dream, and it also indicates the difficulty of understanding with family members and many disagreements with them. What is the interpretation of eggplant in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that the vision is not good because it indicates the worries and sorrows that the dreamer carries because he is going through many problems in the current period that It causes him anxiety and steals sleep from his eyes, and the dream is a warning to him. Whoever is patient, endures, and trusts in the mercy of God Almighty, who will ease his distress and compensate him for what has befallen him. An indication that the dreamer is preoccupied with many negative thoughts about the future, so he needs to calm down a little and relax and not think too much about the future so as not to lose sight of his present. If the dreamer sees eggplant in a period Its growth and maturity, that is, in its season, this indicates abundant livelihood, success, and excellence in personal and professional life. As for seeing and eating it out of season in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will soon hear sad news about a friend or relative and will be very sad upon hearing it. A specialized Egyptian website that includes A team of leading interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Eggplant in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Fahd Al-Osaimi believes that the dream indicates goodness and blessings and carries many omens for the dreamer of improving his personal, material and health conditions, especially if the eggplant is white. If the dreamer sees a ripe eggplant and its shape is beautiful, this means that The dreamer is honest. He approaches God Almighty with his good deeds, maintains his duties, and does not neglect his duties in his religion. His lineage in the vision is an indication of the good qualities that the dreamer distinguishes, and that he treats people with kindness and gentleness, as the dream shows that he is an honest person and does not lie or deceive.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the angel of death in the form of a woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the angel of death in the form of a woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the angel of death in the form of a woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the angel of death in the form of a woman in a dream could be a sign of hypocrisy, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the angel of death in the form of a woman in a dream, it may be This is evidence of his hypocrisy in religion, and God knows the unseen. But if the dreamer sees the angel of death in the form of a man, this may indicate safety, and God knows best. It could also be an indication of strength and security after fear, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The interpretation of a dream about the death of a married man in a dream could be the interpretation of a dream. Interpretation of a dream about death A child in an accident in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a child dying in an accident in a dream. Operating a child can lead to mistakes, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a child being beaten in a dream, this may be an indication of wrong actions, and God knows the unseen. Seeing accidental death can also express chaos and thoughts. Confused, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the death of a young child in a dream, this may be evidence of a problem for the dreamer or the child’s family, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my friend’s daughter in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my friend’s daughter in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing the death of a daughter could be A sign of bad, and God Almighty is Most High. If a married woman sees the death of her daughter, this may be evidence of the loss of someone she loves, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the death of a daughter may also express worries, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my friend’s grandmother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my friend’s grandmother in a dream. Seeing the death of the grandmother may express fatigue, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the death of the grandmother tomorrow, this indicates that he will not search for a living, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees the death of the grandmother and shrouding her, this may lead to him hiding her secrets and mentioning her virtues, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my fiancé’s family in a dream. Interpretation of a dream The death of my fiancé’s family in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing the death of my fiancé in a dream may be a sign that I have been freed from anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the death of my fiancée, perhaps this means the wedding is near, and God knows best. In the event that an unmarried girl sees the death of her fiancé It may be a sign of longevity, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a grandson in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about the death of a grandson in a dream could be an indication of great sad events in the family, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees the death of her grandson in a dream, this could be evidence of disasters. In the family, and God knows the unseen. But if the dreamer sees the death of the grandson being killed, this may be an indication of the injustice of his parents, and God knows best. title: Seeing smile and laughter in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a smile and laughter in a dream means happiness, joy, and comfort. It is also said that smiling and laughing in a dream if teeth appear is evidence that the dreamer has a good relationship with his relatives and that there are mutual benefits between him and his family. Likewise, smiling and laughing in a dream is evidence that the monarch will receive happy news in the coming days. Coming and he will ease the affairs of his life and achieve his desires smoothly, God knows best. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a smile and laughter in a dream for a married womanSeeing a smile and laughter in a dreamWhen a wife sees in a dream that someone is smiling at her, it means that good luck, good fortune and living will come to her And to her husband. Seeing a married woman in a dream means that someone is laughing at her, that she will receive good news and achieve her dream that she wants to reach in the next few days, by God’s command. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a smile and laughter in a dream from a specific person. A smile from a specific person means In the dream, there is evidence of the exchange of love, tenderness, and an intimate relationship between the person and the dreamer. When a person sees that someone is smiling and laughing at him in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will take advantage of the person who smiled at him in the dream in the coming days. If one sees that another person is smiling at him and that person is In a relationship with the dreamer, whether it is engagement or marriage, this means that the other smiling person will be happy in the coming days. Dream interpreters unanimously agreed that laughing and smiling in a dream is evidence of getting rid of debts that exhaust the dreamer into denial, even though the dreamer dreams of getting rid of debts. From the disease that he suffers from. Read also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. A dream of a pregnant woman smiling in her sleep and also laughing. Seeing a child smiling and laughing in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign that this woman will care more about males than females. When a pregnant woman sees herself laughing and smiling in her dream And she is carrying a child in her arms, this is a sign that her child will be healthy. Seeing a pregnant woman smiling and laughing with someone she loves is a sign that her birth will be without difficulties, while when she dreams that she sees someone smiling and laughing at her, this is evidence that kindness and wealth prevail. After her birth. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a smile and laughter in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees someone smiling at her, whom she also does not know, then this is evidence that she expects an honest future and a happy life. When a divorced woman sees someone she knows laughing at her, this is evidence that her husband The one who divorced her will return to her and live a happy life. Seeing one person smiling and laughing with him in a dream. For a single person, seeing a smile and laughing in a dream, and smiling with dimples, is evidence of the blessings and blessings that God Almighty has given him, which are countless, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing one person imprisoned With someone smiling at him, this is a sign that freedom will prevail for the dreamer. When a single man sees that a girl is laughing at him and smiling and he knows her and is happy with her in the dream, this is evidence that he will

title: Interpretation of seeing the death of a fetus in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the death of the fetus by Ibn Sirin: The death of the fetus in a dream indicates the presence of a number of difficulties and problems that disturb the insight. It also indicates that the person with the insight is exposed to some psychological pressures that occupy his mind and exhaust his body. What if he sees a pregnant woman whose fetus has given birth in a dream? This is a sign that this pregnancy is not complete. Woman.Interpretation of the death of a fetus in the womb for a married woman. Seeing a dream about the death of a fetus in the womb. A married woman has a good vision and good news for her that she will become pregnant if she is not pregnant. But if she sees that she is the one requesting an abortion in the dream, this is a sign that she will suffer great losses in her work. There is an interpretation Another of this vision is the revelation of things and secrets that she had been hiding from her husband for a long time. What if a married woman sees blood coming out of her in a dream during a miscarriage, this is evidence that she is committing many sins and does not want to repent for them. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a fetus in the womb for a single woman. See the point: Death of a fetus An unmarried girl: A happy and joyful occasion is approaching for this girl, it could be an engagement or a wedding. This dream shows the financial ability of this girl and her high and good financial status. This vision may also indicate that she will be connected to the person she loves and desires as her life partner. Another interpretation of this The vision is that it may indicate that this girl will pay off all her debts and that she will be freed from some of the responsibilities that have burdened her in her life. But if there is any indication of surgery in this vision, then this is a sign of major problems and differences between her and her lover that may reach the point of separation. Interpretation of the death of the fetus in the womb for a non-pregnant woman: This dream indicates the end of the worries and problems that exist between this woman and her husband. Likewise, the death of the fetus and its delivery in a dream is evidence of great relief for the non-pregnant woman from many things that were disturbing and disturbing her life. It is also possible that this vision is Good news for this woman in the near future of pregnancy. If she sees blood in the dream accompanied by the death of the fetus, this is evidence that she is committing sins and disobedience in her dream and she must repent for them. If the process of the death of the fetus takes place through a surgical operation in the dream, then this is a sign of a problem. Or a major scandal in the path of this woman. The interpretation of seeing the death of a fetus in a dream for a man. The interpretation of this vision varies, of course, for a man, and the interpretation may differ depending on the professions of insight. If the dreamer is a doctor and sees in a dream that he aborted a woman, this is an indication that he will face many problems that will not It ends in his work. This vision also shows that the visionary does not care about his work, is not conscientious towards his patients, and does not give them their rights. This vision also shows that this person is going through a series of difficult crises that are disturbing his life. But if the man sees a dead fetus in his dream, this is a sign Good nutrition is on his way to him. Likewise, if a man dreams of a dead fetus in his wife’s womb, this is an indication that his wife will become pregnant, God willing. This vision also indicates that the owner of the bass

Likewise, the death of the fetus and its delivery in a dream is evidence of great relief for the non-pregnant woman from many things that were disturbing and disturbing her life. It is also possible that this vision is Good news for this woman in the near future of pregnancy. If she sees blood in the dream accompanied by the death of the fetus, this is evidence that she is committing sins and disobedience in her dream and she must repent for them. If the process of the death of the fetus takes place through a surgical operation in the dream, then this is a sign of a problem. Or a major scandal in the path of this woman. The interpretation of seeing the death of a fetus in a dream for a man. The interpretation of this vision varies, of course, for a man, and the interpretation may differ depending on the professions of insight. If the dreamer is a doctor and sees in a dream that he aborted a woman, this is an indication that he will face many problems that will not It ends in his work. This vision also shows that the visionary does not care about his work, is not conscientious towards his patients, and does not give them their rights. This vision also shows that this person is going through a series of difficult crises that are disturbing his life. But if the man sees a dead fetus in his dream, this is a sign Good nutrition is on his way to him. Likewise, if a man dreams of a dead fetus in his wife’s womb, this is an indication that his wife will become pregnant, God willing. This vision also indicates that the owner of the bass

title: Learn about the interpretation of apples in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: An apple in a dream: Jurists do not find malice in seeing apples except in certain cases, such as: the apples are spoiled, sour, or have a bad taste. In this article, we take a look at all the clues mentioned by jurists about apples and their interpretation, and we also list the details and issues that differ from one person to another. Apple in a dream Seeing apples indicates good morals and good qualities, good faces and happiness, good deeds, enjoyment of vitality and health, And long life, and recovery from illness. Eating apples is praiseworthy, and it contains kindness, nourishment, and health, with the exception of yellow and sour apples, and sourness indicates hostility and enmity, and sweetness indicates love and friendship. Whoever sees that he is picking apples, he will have a blessed son, and if the apple is red He is blessed with a beautiful girl, and whoever eats apples will attain great or long and blessed benefits. Offspring. And if he sees that he is buying apples, this indicates an abundance of sustenance, and an increase in the world, and giving apples indicates strong relationships, marriage, joy, and good news. Apples in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that apples indicate the benefits that a person reaps from his work, study, travel, or position. New, and that apples show high strength and high morale, and it is lawful money that a person earns with sweat. A ripe apple is better than a sour one, and a sweet apple is better than a bad apple, and measured apples are evidence of wealth and profit. If the dreamer sees someone throwing apples at him, then this person is doing him a favor. It helps him meet his needs and achieve his desires, and sour apples indicate hostility, alienation, and harsh feelings. Whoever sees an apple tree, this indicates a good and honest person who people will benefit from because of his closeness to them. Apples in Al-Osaimi’s dream Al-Osaimi says that apples indicate a beautiful and happy face, and many apples indicate Children and long offspring.Apples denote culminating intercourse or marriage and marriage. Whoever eats the apple will have intercourse with his wife and his life will be blessed and happy. The apple symbolizes the years. If the value of the apple is known, then these are the years in which he receives occasions and good news, during which he may obtain a wonderful position or a high promotion. And whoever sees that he keeps apples or puts them in his pocket, these are benefits and money that he will reap and not bear, and if he takes an apple he will be blessed with a son like him. In qualities and characteristics, and he can obtain spoils from a traveler or an absent person. On the other hand, the apple is an indicator of what a person wants in this world. The merchant reaps what he wants from his trade, the farmer from his land, and the king from his property and authority, and each according to his profession and work. . Apples in a dream for a single woman. Apples are considered good news for the single girl about marriage, a blessed life, happiness, abundant livelihood, wages, and success in work and study. Buying apples indicates new beginnings, stability, and reassurance. But if she sees that she is peeling apples, this indicates poor choice of what suits her, and kindness. It reaches the point of naivety, and she may neglect her reputation and honor because of the intensity of her kindness, and she should be so. caution

title: The 11 most famous interpretations of seeing the Messenger Muhammad, peace and blessings be upon him, in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream? Evidence of recovery if the dreamer is sick. The meaning of a man seeing the Prophet dead in a dream? It indicates the death of one of his descendants. What is the interpretation of seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream and he is happy? It announces Hajj. What is the meaning of seeing the Prophet Muhammad In a dream? Good news and plenty of sustenance. What is the interpretation of seeing the Messenger Muhammad and some companions in a dream? It indicates that the monarch is a good person and God will bless his family. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about the Prophet MuhammadSeeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream is evidence of recovery if the dreamer is sick Then, seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream is evidence that you have not entered Hell. Whoever sees the Prophet Muhammad in a dream is happy, this indicates Hajj. If one sees the Prophet in a dream in a barren land, then that land will be fertile and fruitful, because it is a sign of goodness. Then seeing The Prophet in a dream while he is standing, this indicates a good dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating from the Messenger, eating or drinking, will attain a lot of goodness. Interpretation of the Prophet’s dream about a man: Seeing a dead person in a dream means the death of one of his descendants. If a man sees in a dream that he is feeding the Prophet, then this An order from the Prophet on him to pay zakat on his money. After that, seeing the Prophet’s funeral in a dream indicates that misfortunes will occur at the place of the funeral. If one sees himself attending the Prophet’s funeral, this indicates the spread of heresies. If a man sees the Prophet in a dream and he is skinny, this indicates The lack of inheritance from the family of that Prophet. Seeing the Prophet’s dream about an unmarried womanIf an unmarried girl sees the Prophet Muhammad in a dream and talks to him, she will be blessed with a moral and religious husband. Seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream is good news for prosperity and abundance. Interpretation of the Prophet’s dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees The Prophet in a dream and she entered his house and greeted the Prophet’s household, then this indicates good luck and a good life. If a married woman sees the Prophet in a dream and greets Mrs. Khadija, this is a sign of a lot of money. If she sees that she is sitting with the Prophet and feeding her, then she will give birth to a very beautiful boy. Seeing a dream about the Prophet about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees the Prophet in a dream, she will be blessed with a baby girl who has the characteristics of the daughters of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. If a pregnant woman dreams that she enters the house of the Prophet Muhammad and sees Al-Hassan and Al-Hussein, this is evidence that she will be blessed with twins. Interpretation of a dream about the Prophet in NabulsiIf one sees The Messenger Muhammad and some companions in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is righteous and that God will bless his family. Seeing the Prophet in a dream is evidence of fulfilling needs and paying off debts. If one sees in a dream that he received a ring from the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, this indicates a great mission that will succeed. .

title: Interpretation of swimming in a dream: I dreamed that I was swimming in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of bathing for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, and for a pregnant woman, whether in the sea, river, pool, or swimming pool, in the company of an unknown or known person, according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing the same person swimming well in a dream symbolizes success in a practical, professional, social, or emotional way, if the dreamer’s head is in A dream outside the water: If a person sees in his dream that he is swimming with difficulty, or that he is swimming in water muddy with mud, dirt, or harmful insects, or that he is unable to lift his head from the water, this warns the dreamer of shame. And a loss in his life or that he will go through a difficult period, a crisis that will shake his entire life. A single girl who sees herself in a dream as a skilled swimmer indicates her balanced emotional life and also her calm and balanced spirit. An unmarried girl who sees water in a dream about swimming symbolizes a lover, so if the water is clear and clean This indicates a clear future with him. If the water is dirty, it symbolizes the playfulness and violation of her lover and partner and the lack of seriousness in matters of marriage. Seeing an unmarried woman drowning while swimming in the water indicates her involvement in a relationship that leaves her with major problems such as pregnancy and scandals that she cannot Her acceptance. As for a married woman, swimming in a dream symbolizes her marital and intimate relationship with her husband, and shows her ability to communicate with her husband. Seeing water in swimming symbolizes the husband, as pure, pure water shows passion, love, and devotion between the two sides. Dirty water symbolizes infidelity, hostility, abandonment, divorce, or deterioration of the relationship Intimacy between spouses and the husband’s loss of his sexual ability. As for a pregnant woman, swimming symbolizes childbirth for her, and good swimming and clear water symbolizes an easy and natural birth, while swimming with difficulty portends a difficult birth or a cesarean section, and clear water means the safety and health of the newborn. The sea is a symbol of livelihood, kindness and money. And seeing yourself swimming in the sea indicates that you will work hard, earn and work, and this is in a man’s dream. As for the sea in a woman’s dream, it symbolizes the man, lover, or husband. Seeing sea waves in a dream symbolizes passion, and the beach is home and family. The beach in a woman’s dream can indicate a husband, father, or A brother, that is, a person who gives her security and feels love without a sensual feeling. Seeing one person swimming in the sea indicates a new love. The river is a symbol of time, a day, a month, or a year, meaning that the river symbolizes the time in the life of the dreamer. Seeing swimming in the river in a man’s dream symbolizes Successful travel or work. In a dream of a single woman, a year will keep her engagement or marriage. A married woman in a dream symbolizes pregnancy or childbirth. In a dream of a pregnant woman giving birth to a male child. A swimming pool is considered a sign of insomnia, stress, or illness if it is narrow, dirty, or broken. Seeing swimming in it in this way symbolizes problems Disagreements in the family and among children. Seeing a beautiful swimming pool with clear, clean water indicates good relationships, family cohesion, and cohesion, and it is a sign of wealth and prosperity.

title: Interpretation of a dream about jinn in human form by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a jinn in the form of a human is one of the visions that many people are surprised by, and the matter may not stop at the point of surprise, but rather they feel very afraid when they wake up from sleep, and it is natural for the interpretation of the vision to be. It differs from one person to another, but the vision in general shows the presence of a person in the dreamer’s life who looks at all his circumstances and hopes that his life will be a failure, full of difficulties and problems, because he is an evil person and is dissatisfied with him. His livelihood and looks at the source of livelihood of others. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn in the form of a human. To see someone in a dream that someone is a colleague at work in the form of jeans symbolizes the extent of the hatred, hatred and hatred that this person has towards the other person and also wants to remove the viewer from his place at work and take his place. The body of a man in a dream, and this indicates that this person is unable to solve all the problems he finds himself in. If one sees a jinn in the form of a man in a dream, this indicates that the money from this trade came through illegal means and he must search until he reaches the sources of this trade. Funds and verify their permissible sources. He looks at the beautiful things in his life, but he is always looking for only shortcomings and misfortunes. Moreover, he exaggerates small problems and makes them a big problem that he cannot solve, even though it is a trivial problem. Interpretation of a dream about jinn in human form by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that this vision has more than Interpretation and meaning, as he interpreted seeing the jinn in the form of a man in a dream as evidence that this person has a high status and is heard among people and many people want to sit with him and talk to him. On the other hand, Ibn Sirin believes that this vision is a warning message from God to the dreamer because He works to harm and harm others, and he must stop this energy. Seeing a genie in the form of a human in a dream is evidence that there is someone who wants to enter the dreamer’s house to steal it, and he must put the house under surveillance and keep everything expensive and valuable outside his house. One of the bad friends in the dreamer’s life and he must stay away from them immediately. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn in the form of a man for a single woman: Seeing one jinn in the form of a human in a dream indicates her relationship with someone she loves, but unfortunately this person is not trustworthy because he wants to harm her, because he is a cunning person. And deception and must be kept away from him.. A friend of hers hates her and wishes her trouble and pain. Seeing one jinn but she thought he was a human, but she felt some fears for this person, is evidence that her personality is very strong and that God will reveal the truths of people to her. By someone, and he must constantly read the Qur’an and memorize the morning and evening remembrances. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn in the form of a man for a married woman. Seeing a married jinn in the form of a human and this jinn in the house indicates that she is experiencing major marital problems, and if she tries to remove this genie and fails, this indicates She wants to reconcile with her husband and resolve everything. Problems, but she is a person who is not easy to please. If the married jinn is expelled from her home, this indicates that disagreement and marital problems will be resolved.

Ibn Sirin believes that this vision has more than Interpretation and meaning, as he interpreted seeing the jinn in the form of a man in a dream as evidence that this person has a high status and is heard among people and many people want to sit with him and talk to him. On the other hand, Ibn Sirin believes that this vision is a warning message from God to the dreamer because He works to harm and harm others, and he must stop this energy. Seeing a genie in the form of a human in a dream is evidence that there is someone who wants to enter the dreamer’s house to steal it, and he must put the house under surveillance and keep everything expensive and valuable outside his house. One of the bad friends in the dreamer’s life and he must stay away from them immediately. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn in the form of a man for a single woman: Seeing one jinn in the form of a human in a dream indicates her relationship with someone she loves, but unfortunately this person is not trustworthy because he wants to harm her, because he is a cunning person. And deception and must be kept away from him.. A friend of hers hates her and wishes her trouble and pain. Seeing one jinn but she thought he was a human, but she felt some fears for this person, is evidence that her personality is very strong and that God will reveal the truths of people to her. By someone, and he must constantly read the Qur’an and memorize the morning and evening remembrances. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn in the form of a man for a married woman. Seeing a married jinn in the form of a human and this jinn in the house indicates that she is experiencing major marital problems, and if she tries to remove this genie and fails, this indicates She wants to reconcile with her husband and resolve everything. Problems, but she is a person who is not easy to please. If the married jinn is expelled from her home, this indicates that disagreement and marital problems will be resolved.
